title: A decentralised exchange(DEX) on solana.
description: A decentralised exchange is a network that allows anybody to swap cryptocurrency tokens over the blockchain by performing a transaction between two tokens, such as the SOL-KAFE pair.  Decentralized exchanges (DEX), such as PancakeSwap or Uniswap, are self-contained financial protocols powered by smart contracts that let cryptocurrency traders to convert their holdings.
